Reviews.Title: Very good phone!
Reviews.Author: Luis Hermosilla Díaz
Reviews.Content: everything that it's said of this phone it's true. Is very resistant, the waterproof and wet fingers tracking Works amazingly good and it's very resistant and fast, android 4.1 runs very smooth. Best phone i ever had!

Reviews.Title: Exceded my expectations.
Reviews.Author: Timothy Smith
Reviews.Content: I'm retired and spend a lot of time on the water duck hunting and fishing along with traveling to Europe and Africa. It took a while to find an unlocked GSM tough smart phone that meet my requirements. Like any smart phone you will need to charge it daily if you enable WiFi/GPS/Data roaming. With just the phone enabled it will stay up for 10 days. I went with a tough phone after seeing my grand kids destroy their parents I-phones.After I received the phone I took it on a 5 day Elk hunt to New Mexico, it was in my pocket and worked at -15F. I have not dropped it on the ground nor have I put in the water to see if it meets the IP-67 standards. I have put it on the boat console in light rain and banged thru chop with no problems.This phone is not for everyone it is not sleek but it does what it is supposed to do with minimal upkeep

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Barry
Reviews.Content: THIS IS THE BEST AND TOUGHEST PHONE I HAVE FOUND! I LOVE IT. IT IS EASY TO USE AND EASY TO HOLD

Reviews.Content: cell is not functional in my country ( Costa Rica ) not receiving a signal and is very slow. only works with wireless access

Reviews.Content: Question can I use whatsapp with it? Is it compatible with normal apps like other phones? Where can I purchase this product?
